name: Sunshine
description: An Android weather forecast app that utilizes OpenWeatherMap's API using the knowledge gained from Udacity's course: Developing Android Apps.

name: Web crawler
description: A script to crawl the web using Google's PageRank algorithm.

name: Personal web app
description: A web app hosted on Google App Engine Standard Environment which has a blog, a registration system and RESTful APIs in JSON & XML formats. It utilizes memcache to have almost zero read from Google Datastore in order to speed up data retrieval.

name: Chirp
description: A Twitter clone using the MEAN stack (MongoDB, Express, Angular & Node).

name: Sur News
description: An Android app that fetches local news about Sur using jsoup library.

name: Yamba
description: A micro blogging app created while learning from Android Bootcamp Series.

name: mimic
description: A web framework that implements the WSGI interface.
